mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_inventorybaseresult (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, DETAILID, QUANTITY, TYPE, STATUS, SKUID, STORAGEID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_wms_inventorybaseresult set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITID = #{itid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAILID = #{detailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEID = #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, DETAILID, QUANTITY, TYPE, STATUS, SKUID, STORAGEID from t_wms_inventorybaseresult where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ITID, DETAILID, QUANTITY, TYPE, STATUS, SKUID, STORAGEID from t_wms_inventorybaseresult
